Since its inception in 1994, Hillsdale has combined the talents of both nationally recognized designers and globally accredited factories to bring you furniture styling and design from around the world that adds beauty to any home.

Hillsdale Furniture's Cottage headboard offers you the perfect opportunity to update any bedroom décor. Easy to match to your existing chests, dressers and nightstands, the modern classic lines and timeless shiny white finish will completely transform your décor from dull to dynamite.
